title: Saranta Ekklēsiai
description: A town in Eastern Thrace with signs of habitation dating from the Paleolithic period; it became a major city in European Turkey in the Ottoman period, and is now the capital of Kırklareli Province.

properties.description: Point representing the geographic center of the modern city of Kırklareli, derived from OpenStreetMap and GeoHack.
properties.title: OSM location of Kırklareli
